Examples
========

This section provides practical examples and tutorials for PhenoScope.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Example Categories

   use_cases
   
Gallery Examples
----------------

.. note::
   These examples show the input and output of code in a Jupyter notebook-like format.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Auto-Generated Examples

   ../auto_examples/index
